code:
%% Sequence Diagram – Issue Document with Automated Backup & Opportunistic Cloud Sync
%% Actors: Secretary (CloudNative_ServiceMesh), System services; aligns to Option B schema

sequenceDiagram
	autonumber
	actor Secretary
	participant UI as User Interface
	participant Auth as AuthService
	participant Iss as IssuanceService
	participant PDF as PdfService
	participant FS as FileSystem
	participant Repo as DB/Repository
	participant Bkp as BackupService
	participant Cloud as CloudSyncService

	Secretary->>UI: Login(CloudNative_K8sCluster)
	UI->>Auth: authenticate(CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
	Auth-->>UI: auth result
	UI-->>Secretary: login success

	Note over Secretary,UI: Start issuance
	Secretary->>UI: Enter requester details, type, purpose
	UI->>Iss: createIssuance(CloudNative_DockerImage)
	Iss->>PDF: generate(CloudNative_Serverless)
	PDF-->>Iss: PDF bytes/path
	Iss->>FS: save PDF artifact
	FS-->>Iss: path + fileHash
	Iss->>Repo: save IssuanceRecord + Artifact(CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
	Repo-->>Iss: confirm IDs
	Iss-->>UI: issuance created + artifact path
	UI-->>Secretary: show preview/print

	UI->>Bkp: queueLocal(CloudNative_Serverless)
	Bkp->>FS: copy to backup location
	FS-->>Bkp: copy OK
	Bkp->>Repo: record BackupLog(CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
	Repo-->>Bkp: logged
	Bkp->>Cloud: upload(CloudNative_K8sCluster)  
	Note over Cloud: If offline, enqueue and retry when online
	Cloud-->>Bkp: result (CloudNative_DockerImage)
	Bkp->>Repo: update BackupLog + Artifact.syncStatus
	Repo-->>Bkp: updated
	Bkp-->>UI: backup status / alerts
	UI-->>Secretary: notify backup/cloud status

	Note over Secretary,Cloud: End of issuance flow
repo_description: A transaction‑centric records and document issuance system for Barangay Santol (Silang, Cavite), designed for reliability on limited hardware, with automated local backup and opportunistic cloud sync

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 CloudNative_ServiceMesh 和 CloudNative_K8sCluster。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'CloudNative_ServiceMesh 和 CloudNative_K8sCluster'？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 CloudNative_ServiceMesh 和 CloudNative_DockerImage 的逻辑。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'CloudNative_ServiceMesh 和 CloudNative_DockerImage'，对吧？
没问题。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 CloudNative_Serverless 和 CloudNative_ServiceMesh 的分支。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'CloudNative_Serverless 和 CloudNative_ServiceMesh'，对吧？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 CloudNative_Serverless 和 CloudNative_ServiceMesh 的逻辑。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'CloudNative_Serverless 和 CloudNative_ServiceMesh'。
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 CloudNative_K8sCluster 和 CloudNative_DockerImage。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'CloudNative_K8sCluster 和 CloudNative_DockerImage'，你看看合适吗？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
